page.title: 14EDUCATION
page.content: Education provision in the Ellon area is of both{primary}and{secondary level. There is one secondary school, {Ellon Academy}with{1450 pupils,}which is situated near the centre of the town. There are also two primary schools,{Ellon Primary School}and {Meiklemill Primary.}Both have about three hundred to four hundred pupils. On finishing primary education the pupils go to{secondary education}at Ellon Academy. These primaries are only two of the{21}schools which send their pupils to Ellon Academy. There are no further education establishments in this area because population numbers do not justify their existence and Aberdeen 16 miles to the south provides such facilities. There is a demand for{Ordinary and {Higher grade evening classes.}There are also several{nursery schools.
